TestCase.TestCase_Title: Add a category to a context

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "AdminContext" administrator context is displayed within the context viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select the administrator mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "Administrator"
Right click on the "AdminContext" context and select "New" -> "Category" in the contextual menu
Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Category0" category has been added to the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
Select the user mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "User"
Create a participation to the "AdminContext" administrator context called "Participation to AdminContext"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Participation to AdminContext" context has been added to the context viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Unfold the "Participation to AdminContext" context in the context viewer

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Participation to AdminContext" context contains a "Category0" category

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Right click on the "Participation to AdminContext" context and select "New" -> "Category" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Category1" category has been added to the "Participation to AdminContext" context in the context viewer

TestCase.TestCase_Title: Add a category to a category

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "AdminContext" administrator context is displayed within the context viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Add a "Category0" category to the "AdminContext"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Category0" category is displayed in the context viewer within the "AdminContext" context

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Right click on the "Category0" category and select "New" -> "Category" in the contextual menu
Unfold the "Category0" category in the "AdminContext" context

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Category0" sub-category has been added to the top-level "Category0" category within the context viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
Select the user mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "User"
Create a participation to the "AdminContext" administrator context called "Participation to AdminContext"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Participation to AdminContext" context has been added to the context viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Unfold the "Participation to AdminContext" context in the context viewer

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Participation to AdminContext" context contains a "Category0" category

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Right click on the "Participation to AdminContext" context and select "New" -> "Category" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Category1" category has been added to the "Participation to AdminContext" context in the context viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Right click on the "Category1" category and select "New" -> "Category" in the contextual menu
Unfold the "Category1" category in the context viewer

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Category0" sub-category has been added to the top-level "Category1" category within the context viewer

TestCase.TestCase_Title: Add a category to the Orchestra category

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "AdminContext" administrator context is displayed within the context viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Right click on the "Orchestra" category and select "New" -> "Category" in the contextual menu
Unfold the "Orchestra" category in the context viewer

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Category0" sub-category has been added to the top-level "Oarchestra" category within the context viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
Select the user mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "User"
Create a participation to the "AdminContext" administrator context called "Participation to AdminContext"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Participation to AdminContext" context has been added to the context viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Unfold the "Participation to AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Unfold the "Orchestra" category in the "AdminContext" context
Right click on the "Orchestra" category and select "New" -> "Category" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Category1" sub-category has been added to the top-level "Orchestra" category within the context viewer

TestCase.TestCase_Title: Cannot add a category to the Orchestra installation category

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "AdminContext" administrator context is displayed within the context viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Right click on the "Orchestra installation" category and seelct "New" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: In the contextual menu, the New -> Category entry is not available
